broadSelectionText: We provide access to the widest range of properties — from apartments to commercial spaces for every need.
customerTrustText: Our clients choose us again and again — we build trusting relationships on which success is based.
reliabilityText: We only work with verified properties and partners. With us, you can be confident in your choice.
easeOfUseText: We have made property search simple and fast — find the best options in just a few clicks.
individualApproachText: Our team is always ready to provide advice and assist at every stage.
secureDealsText: We guarantee that every transaction will be 100% safe and transparent.
consultationCallToAction: Do you want to get a consultation?
videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
aboutUsMission: My Space's mission is to satisfy every client's request, ensuring their safety, peace, and comfort.
aboutUsTextBody: It doesn't matter whether it's residential or commercial real estate—we help our clients make the best choice that precisely meets their needs and increases their capital. Our real estate experts guarantee quality and professionalism at every stage—from the first consultation to the final signature on the documents. The personal approach of our specialists allows us to consider all your ideas and find solutions that turn wishes into addresses. That's why you will confidently recommend us to your acquaintances—because you know that with us it's easy, reliable, and human. We are sincerely pleased to be a part of your important changes and new beginnings!
activeTeamTitle: Most active team members by sales
connectionText: This text helps to outline visual elements in a document or presentation, such as typography, font, or layout. Lorem Ipsum is primarily part of a Latin text by the classical author and philosopher Cicero. These words and letters have been altered by adding or removing them, so they deliberately make the content meaningless, which is not true.
title: Privacy Policy
introText: This privacy policy will help you understand how MySpace uses and protects the data you provide to us when you visit our website and use the forms.
changePolicyText: We reserve the right to change this policy at any time. If you want to stay up-to-date with the latest changes, we advise you to visit this page frequently.
dataCollectionIntro: When you visit our website, we may collect the following data:
contactInfo: • Your contact information and email address.
otherInfo: • Other information such as interests and preferences.
onlineBehaviorProfile: • Data profile regarding your online behavior on our website.
whyCollectDataIntro: We collect your data for several reasons:
improveServices: • To improve our services and products.
sendPromotionalEmails: • To send you promotional emails with information we think you'll find interesting.
contactForResearch: • To contact you to fill out surveys and participate in other types of market research.
customizeWebsite: • To customize our website according to your online behavior and personal preferences.
dataSecurityText: MySpace is committed to ensuring the security of your data and keeping it confidential. MySpace has done everything possible to prevent data theft, unauthorized access, and disclosure by implementing the latest technologies and software that help us protect all information we collect online.
cookiePolicyIntro: Once you agree to allow our website to use cookies, you also agree to use the data it collects regarding your online behavior (web traffic analysis, web pages you visit, and where you spend the most time).
cookieDataUsage: The data we collect through cookies is used to customize our website to your needs. After we use the data for statistical analysis, it is completely removed from our systems.
cookieControl: Please note that cookies do not allow us to control your computer in any way. They are used exclusively to monitor which pages you find useful and which you don't, so we can provide you with a better experience.
cookieDisableInfo: If you want to disable cookies, you can do so by going to the settings of your internet browser. You can visit
cookieDisableInfo2: , which contains comprehensive information on how to do this in a wide range of browsers and devices.
dataDistributionPolicy: MySpace will not rent, sell, or distribute your personal information to third parties without your permission. We may do so if required by law. Your personal information will be used when we need to send you promotional materials if you agree to this privacy policy.
successMessage: Our manager will contact you shortly to discuss the details. Thank you!
